Value: The hero utters mystical words, increasing the magical powers of nearby allies.|n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Adds 50 mana to nearby friendly units. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Adds 100 mana to nearby friendly units. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Adds 150 mana to nearby friendly units. |n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - Adds 200 mana to nearby friendly units.|n|cffffcc00Level 5|r - Adds 250 mana to nearby friendly units.
